mapper.insert: insert into course(user_id, name, author, price, description, sub_name image_url) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{author}, #{price}, #{description}, #{subName} #{imageUrl})
mapper.update: update course set name=#{name}, author= #{author}, price=#{price}, description= #{description}, image_url=#{imageUrl}, checked=0; where course_id = #{courseId};
mapper.select: select c.course_id, u.username, c.name, c.author, c.price, c.description, c.image_url, c.update_time from user u join course c on u.user_id = c.user_id where c.checked = 0 and c.statu = 2;
mapper.update: update course set checked=#{checked}, statu = CASE WHEN #{checked} = 1 THEN 1 ELSE statu END where course_id = #{courseId};
mapper.select: select course.* from course inner join subject on course.sub_name = subject.sub_name where subject.sub_category = #{category};
